user.title: Set up RAPT Integration
user.description: Enter your RAPT username and API secret to connect your RAPT devices.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to RAPT servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or API secret. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This RAPT account is already configured.
